relationships.description: Harry and Ron were friends, but Ron stopped talking to Harry
Harry was a member of Gryffindor house
Harry was unpopular at Slytherin and had helped Gryffindor beat them in Quidditch and the Inter-House Championship
Harry expected Ravenclaws to support him, but they did not
Harry compared himself to Cedric and was disappointed that the Ravenclaws supported Cedric more than him
